metadata.name: Out Of Order
metadata.description:
Meet "Vendy", a futuristic vending machine.

This scene depicts a vending machine providing a vitamin that immediately improves your health without having to put in any work.

The goal is to emphasize the wester societal push towards convenience and instant gratification through the contrast of a vending machine and healthy.

Are we the ones "out of order"?

This scene was rendered in Cycles X and modeled in Blender. The stickers and paper in this scene were handmade and hand torn and then scanned into the 3d scene and applied to the object.
